pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, December 10, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and the President of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs Dominic LeBlanc will participate in the First Ministers’ Meeting.

The Prime Minister and the Premier of Quebec and Chair of the Council of the Federation François Legault will deliver the opening remarks, which will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account:  https://twitter.com/CanadianPM.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability. President of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs Dominic LeBlanc, Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam, and Major-General Dany Fortin will be in attendance.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
